sn35.186:1.1: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccam atitam …pe… jivha anicca atita …pe… mano anicco atito.
sn35.186:1.2: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… jivhayapi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.186:1.3: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.186:1.4: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
